Flowith Web Clipper – Your Gateway to Intelligent Knowledge Management

Flowith Web Clipper is a convenient browser extension that lets you capture inspiration, research, and more as you browse. With a single click, you can save articles, images, or even videos content directly to your Flowith Knowledge Garden — keeping all your valuable ideas in one organized place for AI-driven insights.

Capture any web content

Easily clip articles, entire web pages, and beyond—no more juggling multiple tabs or bookmarks. Flowith Web Clipper also supports direct imports from Notion, YouTube, RED, and Flomo, consolidating all your information in one spot.

AI-powered formatting

Automatically enhance the formatting of captured content. Not only makes it easier for you to read, but also ensures Flowith’s AI can leverage your knowledge base to provide even more accurate answers and insights.

Organize with ease

Enjoy real-time syncing with your Flowith knowledge base, supplemented by smart categorization and tagging. Simply drag and drop to reorganize.

Generate context-specific responses immediately

Select the knowledge you need, ask your questions, and let Flowith’s AI provide tailored answers. Harness the power of your organized knowledge base to spark new ideas, gain clarity, or push your projects forward.
